interestRate.raw:
Floating Interest Rate (Repo-Based + Margin):

Category A:

≤ ₹40L, no collateral: EBLR + 0.50% = 8.50%
≤ ₹150L, 50–<100% collateral: EBLR + 0.25% = 8.25%
≤ ₹150L, ≥100% collateral: EBLR = 8%

Category B:

≤ ₹30L, no collateral: EBLR + 0.75% = 8.75%
≤ ₹150L, 50–<100% collateral: EBLR + 0.50% = 8.5%
≤ ₹150L, ≥100% collateral: EBLR = 8%

Notes:
EBLR on disbursement date applies; reset at least quarterly
Spread fixed for 3 years; subsequent resets every 3 years
Premium fixed till loan maturity
Interest servicing during course/moratorium optional; no extra concessions

Rates- 
https://www.unionbankofindia.bank.in/pdf/retail_roi.pdf 
https://www.unionbankofindia.bank.in/en/details/educational-loan-interest-rate
bullets: EBLR on disbursement date applies; reset at least quarterly
Spread fixed for 3 years; subsequent resets every 3 years
Interest servicing during course/moratorium optional; no extra concessions

interestRate.raw:
Floating Interest Rate (RLLR + BSP + Margin):

1. Institutes in Annexure-B (≥100% collateral):
Floating ROI: RLLR + BSP (≈8.10%)
Fixed ROI: 9.10% (≤10 yrs), 9.60% (>10 yrs)

2. Other institutes (≥100% collateral):
Male: Floating ROI = RLLR + BSP + 1.25% (≈9.35%), Fixed ROI = 10.35% (≤10 yrs), 10.85% (>10 yrs)
Female: Floating ROI = RLLR + BSP + 0.75% (≈8.85%), Fixed ROI = 9.85% (≤10 yrs), 10.35% (>10 yrs)

3. Loan ≤ ₹7.5 lakh (under CGFSEL):
Male: Floating ROI = RLLR + BSP + 2.00% (≈10%), Fixed ROI = 11.10% (≤10 yrs), 11.60% (>10 yrs)
Female: Floating ROI = RLLR + BSP + 1.50% (≈9.60%), Fixed ROI = 10.60% (≤10 yrs), 11.10% (>10 yrs)


Rates & Annexure B - https://pnb.bank.in/Retail-Advances-interst-rate-on-advances-linked-to-mclr.html

Female: Floating ROI = RLLR + BSP + 0.75% (≈8.85%), Fixed ROI = 9.85% (≤10 yrs), 10.35% (>10 yrs)

>3 to 5 years         2 times
<= 3 years             1 time
